name: Miraidon
flavorText: Much remains unknown about this creature. It resembles Cyclizar, but it is far more ruthless and powerful.

previous.name: Koraidon
previous.flavorText: This seems to be the Winged King mentioned in an old expedition journal. It was said to have split the land with its bare fists.
